attacks.name: Magma Burn
attacks.effect: Discard the top card from your opponent's deck, and flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Team Magma's Torkoal.

attacks.name: Hot Air
attacks.effect: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Team Magma's Torkoal, and your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon, if any.
